      • setSnapEnabled

        public void setSnapEnabled(boolean enable)
        Enables/disables snapping. When enabling, it sets the snap interval to the extended node's size
        Parameters:
        enable - when true enables snapping, when false disables snapping.

      • getSnapInterval

        public processing.core.PVector getSnapInterval()

      • setSnapInterval

        public void setSnapInterval(processing.core.PVector interval)
        Enables/disables/configures snapping bahaviour.
        Parameters:
        interval - specifies the two-dimensional (z-attribute is ignored) snap interval. When null, disables snapping behaviour.

      • isSnapEnabled

        public boolean isSnapEnabled()
        Returns:
        true if snapping behaviour is enabled

      • isSnapping

        public boolean isSnapping()
        Returns:
        boolean true only if currently snapping to a target position

      • setSnapFactor

        public void setSnapFactor(float newFactor)
        Configures snapping behaviour smoothness
        Parameters:
        newFactor - offset multiplier; higher value means faster snapping.

      • setSnapVelocity

        public void setSnapVelocity(float snapVelocity)
        Configures snapping behaviour responsiveness
        Parameters:
        newSnapVelocity - specifies the velocity at which we'll start snapping into place

      • getSnapPosition

        public processing.core.PVector getSnapPosition()
        Returns:
        PVector current target position for snap-back behaviour. Returns null if not currently snapping

      • setSnapPosition

        public void setSnapPosition(float x,
                            float y)
        Configures the current snapping-target-position (starts snap-back)
        Parameters:
        x - the horizontal target-position
        y - the vertical target-position

      • setSnapPosition

        public void setSnapPosition(processing.core.PVector pos)
        Configures the current snapping-target-position (starts snap-back)
        Parameters:
        pos - the snapping target-position

      • getSnapThrowFactor

        public float getSnapThrowFactor()

      • setSnapThrowFactor

        public void setSnapThrowFactor(float multiplier)
        Configures snap-back behaviour after dragging.
        Parameters:
        multiplier - multiplies the -smoothed- velocity when calculating the snapping-target-position. A higher value makes it "further" throwable.

      • getStepPosition

        public processing.core.PVector getStepPosition()
